array.name: setups
array.item: Why does it take pirates so long to learn the alphabet?
What did the pirate say when his wooden leg got stuck in the freezer?
What is a pirate\'s least favourite vegetable?
How do pirates know that they are pirates?
Why couldn\'t the pirates play cards?
What has eight eyes and eight legs?
What do you call a pirate with two eyes and two legs?
What is Captain Hook\'s favorite store?

array.name: punchlines
array.item: Because they can spend years at C!
They say once ye lose yer first hand, ye get hooked!
The captain was standing on the deck!
